channel.title: Custom object spawning multiple spots
channel.description:
i was wondering if its possible to do checkobjectspawn and make it do like multiple spots for example lets say i wanted a grid of objects
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(10303, 2958 - 3000, 3170 - 3200, 0, 10); and by "-" i mean through dont want it to count as a minus
so i would want this object to spawn x 2958 through 3000, y 3170 through 3200

item.title: Custom object spawning multiple spots

i was wondering if its possible to do checkobjectspawn and make it do like multiple spots for example lets say i wanted a grid of objects
